name: Random Picross Nanogram
description:
I was tired of playing bad picross games. So I've made my version!

Features
  • Randomly generated pictures with endless content
  • Juicy and comfortable controls
  • Dark themed so you don't hurt your eyes
  • Mistake mode: offers a more challenging mode where you can't make more mistake
  • Local high score system (Time based)
  • Very satisfying animation when you finish the pictogram (similar google's minesweeper)
  • Really nice clicky audio feedback with an option to mute
  • Auto-cross mode
  • Customizable grid width and height
How to play Nanograms?

https://www.wikihow.com/Play-Picross-DS

Key Controls For Experts
  • Left Mouse Button to mark as filled
  • Right Mouse Button to mark as empty
  • "Space" to generate new nanogram
  • Hold Left Mouse Button to mark multiple tiles
  • ESC to cancel multi-marks 
  • "F" to toggle fullscreen
  • Hold ESC for 3 seconds to quit
  • Hold Delete to delete all save (including high scores)
  • A secret key that shows you the solution but you shouldn't cheat! 

Color palette: https://lospec.com/palette-list/soggy-newspapers
